resources.string: Plug in or put the YubiKey on the NFC reader.
Put the Yubikey on the NFC reader.
Your device supports neither USB host mode nor NFC. YubiKeys can not be used.
Press the button on your YubiKey.
An error has occurred. Unplug your YubiKey.
An invalid challenge was passed. Contact the support of the app you are trying to use with.
